Name: TORQUE_SENSOR_RAW
Description: raw measurement of the treadmill angular torque sensor.

Name: TORQUE_LOAD_CURRENT_RAW
Description: raw measurement of the output current applied to the variable torque load.

Name: ENCODER_MEAS_RAW
Description: raw measurement of the treadmill encoder (800 ticks per revolution).

Name: TORQUE_LOAD_SETPOINT_RAW
Description: raw setpoint for the torque load.

Name: SUBSYSTEM_RESET
Description: "Writing 1 to specific bits in this register will reset [0] the encoder count
